definition: to water down/to play down/to trivialize/to weaken/to become dull with time/to desalinate/desalination
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Can the technetium view of the outside let E people emotional desalt Ma?
sentences.chinese: 外界的鍀說法會讓莪們的感情淡化嘜？

sentences.english: The salinity in seawater will increase when the sea ice are exploited and desalinated extensively.
sentences.chinese: 海冰的大規模開採和淡化會導致周圍水體的鹽分增加。

sentences.english: Naturally, Cisco is downplaying the significance of its entrance into servers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，思科在淡化其進入服務器市場的意義。

sentences.english: Downplay the scary, chilling, creepy, parts of Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 淡化萬聖節那可怕，令人膽寒生畏的部分。

sentences.english: The traditional forestry shadow is desalinating day by day.
sentences.chinese: 傳統林業的影子正在日趨淡化。

sentences.english: Electrodialysis desalination method is to use a special manufacturing thin-film achieved.
sentences.chinese: 電滲析淡化法是使用一種特別製造的薄膜實現的。

sentences.english: The application of ceramic membranes in the pretreatment of seawater desalinization;
sentences.chinese: 主要煤層含硫低與該區瀉湖及表層海水淡化有關。

sentences.english: The novelty of her surrounding soon wore off.
sentences.chinese: 環境的新奇感很快就淡化了。

sentences.english: China needs to heavily invest into desalinization of sea water.
sentences.chinese: 中國需要大量投資淡化海水。

sentences.english: The reform and development of journals require to desalinate this criterion.
sentences.chinese: 淡化這一“標準”是學報改革與發展的重要方面。

sentences.english: Through repair work or the preparation of literature books, play down the sense of Han nationality.
sentences.chinese: 通過重修或編寫文獻典籍，淡化漢民族意識。

sentences.english: Already some members of the London Organizing Committee for the Olympic Games, or Locog, are damping public expectations.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦奧組委的一些成員已經在淡化公衆的期望。

sentences.english: But soon, the novelty wore off.
sentences.chinese: 但很快，這種新鮮感就逐漸淡化。

sentences.english: Take advantage of this principle, made of multi-stage flash distillation desalination unit urgently.
sentences.chinese: 利用這一原理，做成多級閃急蒸餾海水淡化裝置。

sentences.english: The White House played down any differences among Mr. Obama's advisers.
sentences.chinese: 白宮在儘量淡化奧巴馬總統顧問之間的歧見。

sentences.english: I hope these bahavior will be fade in future, just a habit in a certain period.
sentences.chinese: 希望這些能慢慢淡化，成爲階段性的習慣。

definition: (literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
to cause a wound to close up and heal
(of time) to elapse or pass/(of a situation) to develop or evolve
